title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - Nov 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for November 2019. Pixel 2/XL, 3/XL, and 3a/XL devices running Android 10 will receive these software updates as part of the November OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the Android Security Bulletin update here.

Overview : 

Build Number: 
Pixel 2 (XL): QP1A.191105.004
Pixel 3 (XL): QP1A.191105.003
Pixel 3a (XL): QP1A.191105.003
Pixel 4 (XL): 
US (ATT & Verizon): QD1A.190821.014.C2
US (TMobile, Sprint, Google Fi) & UK carriers: QD1A.190821.014
All other carriers (AU/JP/CA/TW/US): QD1A.190821.007.A3
Notable fixes: 
Improvements for Google Assistant hotword
Improvements for Pixel 3/XL bottom speaker audio quality
Additional fixes for some Pixel 3/XL & 3a/XL devices stuck during boot
Additional support for Xbox BT controller mapping on all Pixels
Improvements for Smooth Display on Pixel 4
Pixel 4 camera quality improvements

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
